headline: Leidos Holdings, Inc. Declares Regular Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: Leidos Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:LDOS) announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.40 per outstanding share of the company's common stock. The cash dividend is payable on June 30, 2025, to stockholders of record as of the close of business on June 16, 2025.

headline: Leidos and RMIT Announce 2025 Aviation Scholarship Recipients at Avalon Airshow
